name: Mortein Refil 60 Nights
description: Mortein Control Liquid is infused with Mortein Deep Reach Liquid to give you longer protection from Malaria, Filariasis & Dengue carrying mosquitoes. For better results always use the refills with Mortein Vaporizer machine. Relax and have a peaceful night sleep knowing that you and your family are protected from those pesky mosquitoes with Mortein – For Peaceful Nights. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
